description: Episode of Series "Dorothy Heathcote Teaching series". Dorothy Heathcote continues her work with a class of nine and ten year old American children. Using drama to create focus and feeling, she poses three moral dilemmas, where the children are confronted with crises involving leadership, old-age, and death. Suitable for teachers and tertiary level.
